text: Clarence Lidington (November 7, 1880 - February 20, 1940) was an American gymnast. He competed in four events at the 1904 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1880 births Category:1940 deaths Category:American male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of the United States Category:Gymnasts at the 1904 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Toronto
title: Clarence Lidington
